{"id":423342991,"lang":"python3","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1606150040,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"56 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/423342991/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"ZigZag Conversion","memory":"14.4 MB","code":"from collections import defaultdict\n\nclass Solution:\n    def convert(self, s: str, rowlen: int) -> str:\n        if rowlen <= 1:\n            return s\n        res = defaultdict(list)\n        \n        inc = 1\n        row = 0\n        for cha in s:\n            res[row].append(cha)\n            row += inc\n            if row == rowlen - 1 or row == 0:\n                inc *= -1\n        \n        return \"\".join(\"\".join(res[i]) for i in range(rowlen))","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
